### PR Checklist

<--- Please check that your PR meets the following expectations. -->

**List-specific criteria**: list items...
* [ ] are about research.
* [ ] communicate guidance.
* [ ] are likely to remain relevant in the future.

**Awesome list general requirements:** each item...
* [ ] has a title (with a hyperlink) and a description.
* [ ] link and description are separated by a dash.
* [ ] description is concise and informative.
* [ ] description starts with an uppercase character and ends with a period.

List items are sorted alphabetically (ascending order by title) within the containing sublist.
